tika.dc.description: Jessica is voluptuous, and not cut out to be anything special. Or so she thinks. When she is attacked one night what comes to her rescue is nothing she could ever have imagined.  Nicholas is tall, sexy and handsome, the perfect Alpha Male. He has a beast within him that calls to Jessica but he isn't the only one. A rival Rex wants her dead or alive. In a fight to the death who will emerge ontop?
